Package klotski.model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
klotski.model.Piece
public class Piece extends Object
a class that represents a single klotski piece
Author:
Joseph Petitti, Enrico De Carli

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Basic constructor for initializing a piece
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the top left corner of the piece
      y - the y coordinate of the top left corner of the piece
      w - the horizontal width of the piece
      h - the vertical height of the piece

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(int direction)
      moves a piece in the given direction on the board. Assumes the move is valid.
      Parameters:
      direction - 0=up, 1=right, 2=down, 3=left

    • containsPoint

      public boolean containsPoint(int x, int y)
      Checks whether this piece contains the given point
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the point being tested
      y - the y coordinate of the point being tested
      Returns:
      true if this piece contains the given point, false otherwise

    • getDims

      public int[] getDims()
      Finds the x and y coordinates of the top left point in the piece, as well as the piece's width and height
      Returns:
      an int array with the left, top, width, and height values

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts this piece to a string, for saving
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representation of this piece

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Piece one)
